ygData.subject: Karana
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, he is a great one for tricks.  He had lev on a friend, and bound him in the air over PoK.  Then he told him to click off the lev.  The guy fell to the
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, he is a great one for tricks. He had lev on a friend, and bound him
in the air over PoK. Then he told him to click off the lev. The guy fell
to the ground, died, came back IN MID AIR, died again and again and again.
I am not sure how they got out of it. I think they had to petition to
change his bind spot!

I have never gone to the arena in Quellious. I do know a couple of women
on my server who are most crazy than I am. I figured it was a guy thing.
I mean, no exp? What's the point?

Beware of dueling druids and necros.

I played my nephew's wiz once with Bryn. He was supposed to be PLing me.
I have a policy against moving wizards when they are OOM. He ran off and
left an orc get me. Never going to play with him again.

Aubrey, Dreadtouch is a nice boy. I recommend him.


*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 11/14/03 at pinkdusk7 wrote:

____>oh my that is too funny, a friend of mine called me up and said
____>come
____>to the arena and help us take down this necro, im like ok. I get
____>ther and we finish off a 50 pally and my friend says go take down
____>briyn (lol he goes anon so i had no idea what lvl he was) so i walk
____>into the arena and attack and 5 seconds later i was dead. He
____>snared , rooted dotted whatever. It is funny how small the world is
____>that's for sure. My friend was like oh my god i was joking hes a 65.
____>But i learned a few valuable lessons that day. while i would love to
____>spy on him i am now fearful of his capabilities lol.
____>
